entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
